titleStmt.title: The poore mans advocate, or, A treatise of liberality to the needy. Delivered in sermons by William Whately minister of Banbury
titleStmt.author: Whately, William, 1583-1639.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G[eorge] M[iller] for George Edwards, and are to be sold at his house in Greene-Arbour, at the signe of the Angell,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
